mapper.select: SELECT a.TeamID, a.TeamName, a.TeamLeaderID, a.Memo, a.CreateUserID, a.CreateTime, a.IfDeleted , t2.Real_Name AS TeamLeaderIDLinkText, t4.Real_Name AS CreateUserIDLinkText FROM PM_Team a left join sys_user t4 on a.CreateUserID = t4.user_id left join sys_user t2 on a.TeamLeaderID= t2.user_id where a.IfDeleted = 0 and ( a.TeamLeaderID = #{userid, jdbcType=INTEGER} or a.teamid in (select teamid from PM_TeamMember where UserID = #{userid, jdbcType=INTEGER}))

SELECT a.TeamID, a.TeamName, a.TeamLeaderID, a.Memo, a.CreateUserID, a.CreateTime, a.IfDeleted , ( SELECT Real_Name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = a.TeamLeaderID ) AS TeamLeaderIDLinkText, t4.Real_Name AS CreateUserIDLinkText FROM PM_Team aon a.CreateUserID = t4.user_id where a.IfDeleted = 0
order by a.OrderNumber, a.TeamName
